function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain prognoses and severe shortages of resources for testing and treatment","Impact":"Increased risk for psychiatric illness associated with Covid-19","Mitigation":"Establishing clear and transparent communication on prognosis and allocating resources effectively","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote consultation and diagnosis","People":"Individuals at risk of psychiatric illness","Owner":"Health care providers"},{"Description":"Imposition of unfamiliar public health measures that infringe on personal freedoms","Impact":"Emotional distress and noncompliance with public health directives","Mitigation":"Education and community engagement to explain the necessity of the measures","Technologies":"Digital platforms for information dissemination","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Conflicting messages from authorities","Impact":"Confusion and emotional distress","Mitigation":"Coordination between authorities to provide consistent and clear messaging","Technologies":"Communication platforms for real-time updates","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"}]}
